Class DontPassBet

Direct Known Subclasses:
DontComeBet
public class DontPassBet
extends LineBet

Don't Pass bet for the come out roll of a craps game.

Author:
Doug Chuchro (doug@chuchro.net)
See Also:
LineBet

Method Detail

setPoint

public void setPoint(int point)
Resets the winning and losing rolls for the "Don't" bets: DontPassBet and DontComeBet.

Specified by:
setPoint in class LineBet
Parameters:
point - The point set be the initial (come out) roll.

checkBet

public int checkBet(Dice dice)
Overrides Bet.checkBet() because of a corner-case in the come out roll. If a 12 is rolled coming out on Don't Pass bet, the bet is considered "pushed", neither won nor lost, and the player gets only his/her original bet amount back

Overrides:
checkBet in class LineBet
Parameters:
dice - The roll of the dice to check the bet against
Returns:
If the bet was won, the amount of the bet's winnings.

setOddsBet

public int setOddsBet(int point,
                      int chipCount)
After the point is set, optionally attach an Odds bet.

Specified by:
setOddsBet in class LineBet
Parameters:
point - The point set for this bet.
chipCount - The player's current chip count, used to determine the maximum value of the bet.
Returns:
The amount of the Odds bet place, to be deducted from the chip count.
